title.rendered: Best Selling Author Sara Connell to Release Book on How to Become a Thought Leader

content.rendered:
Thought Leader Academy: 10x Your Impact and Income Through Your Mission and Message by Sara Connell

The journey to 10x income and impact begins with this book.

Sara Connell has translated how to become a leader and teaching in your area of expertise and passion into a science…”

— Ben Wolf, author

CHICAGO, IL, UNITED STATES, October 24, 2023 /EINPresswire.com/ — Sara Connell is a bestselling author and founder of Thought Leader Academy where she helps coaches, writers and entrepreneurs become successful, published authors and in-demand speakers. In Thought Leader Academy, Connell reveals her revolutionary process that has powered thousands of coaches, experts and entrepreneurs, to harness their unique gifts, achieving both remarkable visibility and prosperity.

Thought Leader Academy is a voyage to the core of one’s passion and purpose. For the first time, Connell reveals her signature process that transforms emerging experts into respected trailblazers.

In Thought Leader Academy, Connell provides readers with not just a roadmap, but the exact steps and strategies to lead and inspire the people they are destined to serve. Readers will emerge with a newfound conviction, ready to revolutionize their industry, illuminate the world with their message, and create millions through their mission.

Thought Leader Academy has received rave reviews.

Amy Yamada says, “Sara Connell is the female Tony Robbins…”

Ben Wolf, author of Fractional Leadership and founder of Wolf’s Edge Integrators, says, “Sara Connell has translated how to become a leader and teaching in your area of expertise and passion into a science…”

Thought Leader Academy shares the details behind Connell’s wildly successful program, as well as actual testimony from various Thought Leaders who have participated in Connell’s program. The pages of Thought Leader Academy brim with rich information, unwavering encouragement and fervent passion.

Excerpt from the book:

“After Holy Hunger saved my life, I vowed to spend the rest of my life paying forward the gift of that experience. I spent over a decade discovering, training, creating, and honing the strategies, mindset paradigms, practices, visualizations, templates, and tools I teach in Thought Leader Academy and now teach in this book so that my clients and now YOU will impact the people who need you and change our world.”

Thought Leader Academy: 10x Your Impact and Income Through Your Mission and Message is published by Muse Literary and will be released on Tuesday October 24, 2023.

Camille Brown
Red Clover Digital
camille@redcloverdigital.com

You just read:

News Provided By

October 24, 2023, 06:54 GMT
